name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Whisper: Listen to Any Web Page Like a Podcast

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turns web pages into audios. Listen to any web page like a podcast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say  goodbye to eye strain and embrace multitasking! Listen to articles, blog posts, and moreâ€”just like your favorite podcasts. It's free, lightweight, fast, works offline, and supports multiple languages.

ðŸŽ§ Key Features:

- Instant Audio Conversion: With just one click, transform any web page into listenable content.
- Smart Content Extraction: Powered by advanced built-in AI*, Web Whisper intelligently extracts the most relevant content from complex web pages.
- Customizable Playlist: Build your personal listening queue as you browse. Save interesting articles for later and listen at your convenience.
- High-Quality Text-to-Speech: Enjoy clear, natural-sounding audio powered by built-in TTS engine. Read aloud your favorite web content.
- Multi-Language Auto-Detection: Automatically detects the language of the current page and selects the appropriate TTS model for seamless audio conversion.
- User-Friendly Controls: Easily play, pause, skip, or delete items in your playlist.
- Hands-Free Browsing: Perfect for multitasking - listen to content while studying, exercising, or working.

ðŸš€ How It Works:

- Click the Web Whisper icon in your Chrome toolbar
- Add the current page to your playlist with one click
- Let our AI* process and extract the important content
- Hit play and start listening immediately or save for later
- Easily drag and rearrange your playlist 

ðŸŒŸ Why Choose Web Whisper?

- Save Time: Consume content while doing other activities
- Reduce Eye Strain: Give your eyes a break from constant screen time
- Improve Comprehension: Some people retain information better through listening
- Accessibility: Makes web content more accessible for various needs
- Customizable Experience: Tailor your listening queue to your interests

Don't just read the web, listen to it! Install Web Whisper now and transform your browsing into a personalized audio experience. Turn any web page into your own private podcast and make the most of your time online.

* Google Chrome's built-in AI (Gemini Nano) is currently an experimental feature and not fully supported yet. We will enable it when the feature becomes available.
